message: Let's split relatively evenly, but I get slightly more as I'm making the first move. This ensures one of us gets a good deal right away and avoids losses from inflation.
Your offer was quite fair, but I believe we can both benefit if we switch the amounts. This ensures a more equitable split while still capitalizing on the early rounds to minimize inflation's impact.
Bob, it seems we both want a slight advantage.  To avoid further losses due to inflation, I propose a perfectly even split this time.  It's the fairest and most efficient way to end this.
